extendedIngredients.name: granny smith apple
extendedIngredients.original: 1 pound Granny Smith apple—halved, cored and cut into large chunks
extendedIngredients.originalName: Granny Smith apple—halved, cored and cut into large chunks

extendedIngredients.name: horseradish
extendedIngredients.original: 1 1/4- to 1/2-ounce piece of horseradish, peeled, or 1 to 2 teaspoons prepared horseradish
extendedIngredients.originalName: horseradish, peeled, or 1 to 2 teaspoons prepared horseradish

extendedIngredients.name: red beet
extendedIngredients.original: 1 small red beet (6 ounces), scrubbed but not peeled, cut into large chunks
extendedIngredients.originalName: small red beet , scrubbed but not peeled, cut into large chunks

title: Boxer's Beet Juice with Horseradish
summary: Boxer's Beet Juice with Horseradish is a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 beverage. One serving contains 170 calories, 2g of protein, and 1g of fat. For $1.82 per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 2. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. If you have celery, granny smith apple—halved, lemon juice, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 10 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 54%. This score is good. Try Rejuvenating Root Juice | Carrot, Beet, Blood Orange, Ginger, Turmeric Juice, Heart Healthy and Cleansing Juice: Beet Carrot Apple Lime Orange Ginger Juice, and Juice Without a Juicer: Apple Carrot Beet Ginger Juice for similar recipes.
instructions: In an electric juicer, juice the beet with the celery, apples, horseradish and rosemary. Stir in the lemon juice and a pinch of salt.

steps.step: In an electric juicer, juice the beet with the celery, apples, horseradish and rosemary. Stir in the lemon juice and a pinch of salt.
